column6: Per die not die set.  Minimum number of dies is 2 per die set.

Use surface area of tool that is used to form part geometry.

Use surface area of tool that is used to form part geometry.  To use this tooling type composite part must have geometry that is possible to obtain from sheet metal tool with no complex curvature or shape.  For example flat panel parts are allowed or parts with curvature in only one axis.
